index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST. PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Chicago Milwaukee & Puget Sound Railway Company, a corporation, its successors and assigns, by Ordinance No. 21594 as amended, extending the term thereof to December 31, 1959, designating the present owners of said franchise and amending Sections 1 and 13 of Ordinance No. 21594 accordingly.
